evidence.claim: HomeSight utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure, including Lambda for serverless computing.
They implement FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
The company supports X12 transaction sets for health claims processing.
HomeSight integrates with Snowflake for data warehousing and analytics.
Use of HL7 V2 for clinical data messaging.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 formats in healthcare claims processing, supporting integration patterns.
